job_description:
- Assist in posting job vacancies on various platforms (LinkedIn, etc.)
- Perform initial CV/resume screening for incoming applications
- Schedule and coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring managers
- Communicate with candidates regarding the recruitment process
- Support employer branding initiatives (campus events, social media, job fairs, etc.)
- Maintain and update the candidate database
- Help with recruitment reports and documentation
- Support other recruitment or HR-related projects as needed
